doc.previous: The countdown restarted on 28 March the burial of the last victim 78 and the country was officially declared Ebola free on 9 May 42 days without any further confirmed case being recorded 5 As of May 2015 the country remained on high alert against recurrence of the disease 79
doc.after: One of the other clinics in Monrovia is a 160 bed facility by M decins Sans Fronti res 80
